nodes.text: A cantina was located on the planet Ankhural. Shortly after the Battle of Hoth, members of the Rebel Alliance's Twilight Company rendezvoused on Ankhural, whilst on the planet several members of Twilight Company including Hazram Namir, Charmer and Twitch visited the cantina.
The cantina appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
